employees.notes: Proff lists 2,639 employees for the legal entity in the latest profile snapshot [1].

revenue.notes: Proff presents revenue as "Beløp i 1000" and reports "Sum driftsinntekter 2024 13 275 105"; converted here to NOK by multiplying by 1,000 [1].

company.entity_resolution_notes: The queried name "FMC Kongsberg Subsea AS" maps to org.nr 986 051 678 on Proff, where the same entity is shown with legal name "TECHNIPFMC NORGE AS" [1].

srm_assessment.overall_summary: No concrete evidence was found that this Norwegian entity uses recycled/recovered/waste-derived materials as inbound input factors. Proff describes subsea system supply activity, while the reviewed group annual report lists conventional raw materials and does not disclose recycled input feedstocks for this entity [1][2].
gaps_and_uncertainties: No subsidiary-level sustainability/ESG disclosure with quantified inbound SRM inputs for TECHNIPFMC NORGE AS was identified in the reviewed public sources [1][2].
The annual report evidence is at TechnipFMC group level, so Norway-entity-specific SRM input use cannot be confirmed from that source alone [2].

evidence.evidence_snippet: Være leverandør av undervanns- og plattformbaserte produksjonssystemer, kontroll- og overvåkningssystemer og annet utstyr til offshore eller landbasert virksomhet
Our business segments purchase carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum, steel castings and forgings, polymers, micro-processors, integrated circuits, and various other materials

evidence.evidence_snippet: We typically do not use single source suppliers for the majority of our raw material purchases;
